sentence.Network_en: A rebellion by radicals failed to materialize.
sentence.Network_cn: 激进分子的叛乱没有得逞。

sentence.Network_en: The promotion he had been promised failed to materialize.
sentence.Network_cn: 答应给他晋升的许诺未能实现。

sentence.Network_en: Their much vaunted reforms did not materialize.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们大肆吹嘘的改革并没有实现。

entry.tran: 变为现实;实现;发生;出现
entry.def: If a possible or expected event does not materialize, it does not happen.

example.ex: A rebellion by radicals failed to materialize...
example.tran: 激进分子的叛乱没有得逞。

example.ex: None of the anticipated difficulties materialized.
example.tran: 预想中的困难全都没有出现。

entry.def: If a person or thing materializes, they suddenly appear, after they have been invisible or in another place.

example.ex: Tamsin materialized at her side, notebook at the ready...
example.tran: 塔姆辛从她身旁冒了出来，且备好了笔记本。

example.ex: A moment or two later champagne in an ice-bucket materialized beside them.
example.tran: 片刻之后，他们身边出现了一只装着香槟的冰桶。

auth_sentence.content: The suffragettes had struggled for years to see this long-overdue basic human right materialize.
auth_sentence.res_content: The suffragettes had struggled for years to see this long-overdue basic human right materialize.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The suffragettes had struggled for years to see this long-overdue basic human right materialize.

auth_sentence.content: I had the glimmering of an idea, and endeavoured to materialize it in words.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had the glimmering of an idea, and endeavoured to materialize it in words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had the glimmering of an idea, and endeavoured to materialize it in words.

auth_sentence.content: Shipments for in-cell touch, which first came to market in 2009, didn't materialize in 2010.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shipments for in-cell touch, which first came to market in 2009, didn't materialize in 2010.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

sentences.en: I don’t think her idealistic plans will ever materialize.
sentences.cn: 我以为她那些空想的计划永远不会实现。

sentences.en: The rise in share prices failed to materialize.
